name: Merchant
description: You earned a living by buying and selling goods, traversing trade routes and navigating bustling marketplaces. Your keen business sense and social savvy have served you well in negotiations both mercantile and otherwise.

features.name: Lucky
features.description: You have a number of Luck Points equal to your Proficiency Bonus. Before or after you roll a d20 for a d20 Test, you can spend a Luck Point to give yourself Advantage on that roll.
